backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the café billing backend with menu management, order creation/finalization, user profiles, sales reporting, and role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind layers and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Café Billing & Menu Manager' and mounting the React root via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with routes for menu, order, bill, and reports pages under a shared AppLayout root, redirecting the index path to /menu.
frontend/src/components/bill/BillItemsTa: Renders a receipt-style table of order items showing name, quantity, unit price, and line total with dashed borders.
Print-optimized receipt layout component displaying the café logo, order timestamp/number, items table, and totals breakdown (subtotal, optional discount, total) with a footer message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper with a sticky header showing the café logo, name, an Admin/Viewer role badge, and a Login/Logout button via Internet Identity, plus a main content outlet and conditional bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Fixed bottom tab bar with Menu, Order, and Reports tabs using Lucide icons, active state highlighting, and 64px minimum tap targets.
frontend/src/components/menu/DeleteMenuI: AlertDialog confirmation component for deleting a menu item, showing the item name and a loading state on the confirm button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Renders a menu category section with item cards showing name, price, and badge count; includes admin-only edit (dialog with MenuItemForm) and delete (DeleteMenuItemDialog) actions per item.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemFor: Form component for creating or editing a menu item with name, price, and category fields; supports preset category selection or a custom category input with validation.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryGr: Displays a 2-column grid of category buttons with emoji icons, display names, and item counts; calls onSelectCategory when a category is tapped.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryIt: Shows a filtered list of menu items for a selected category in a 2-column grid with a back button; filters items by search query and delegates add actions to the parent.
frontend/src/components/order/DeleteOrde: Alert dialog that confirms deletion of the current order, displaying the item count and showing a loading spinner on the confirm button while the delete is in progress.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuCatego: Collapsible accordion component for a menu category that auto-expands during search; renders a 2-column grid of MenuItemCard components inside.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuItemCa: Card component for a single menu item showing its name, formatted price, a plus button, and a badge with the current quantity already in the order.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderItemR: Row component for an item in the active order with increment/decrement quantity controls, a line-total display, and a remove button.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderSumma: Scrollable panel listing all active order items using OrderItemRow; shows an empty-state illustration when no items have been added.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderTotal: Renders the order summary panel showing subtotal, a discount input with flat/percentage toggle, and the final total using formatted currency values.
frontend/src/components/reports/DailySum: Displays a two-card grid showing today's revenue and items sold, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateRang: Renders a date range filter UI with start/end date inputs and an apply button for filtering report data.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateWise: Builds and displays a table of daily sales rows (date, bill count, total sale) derived from dailySales and orders data, with a grand total footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/ItemWise: Renders a table listing item-wise sales with item name, quantity sold, and revenue, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/reports/MonthlyS: Displays a sorted table of monthly sales totals by converting backend month indices to human-readable month/year labels, with a grand total footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/Previous: Shows the previous day's total revenue and bill count in a two-card grid, handling loading and no-data states via the usePreviousDaySales hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRole.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the current authenticated user has admin role, returning isAdmin and isLoading flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderState.ts: Custom React hook managing active order state including items, quantities, discount (flat or percentage), and computed subtotal/discount/total values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including menu items, user profiles, order placement, and sales data queries/mutations, along with category ordering utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a warm café-themed design system using Tailwind CSS with OKLCH color tokens for light/dark modes, typography, print styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, currency/date formatting, nanosecond conversion, and café menu category ordering and display name mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillView.tsx: Page component that reads bill data from sessionStorage and displays a printable bill layout with options to print or start a new order.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagement.tsx: React page for managing menu items, supporting add/edit/delete operations with admin-only controls, grouped by sorted categories.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTaking.tsx: React page for taking orders, allowing staff to browse menu categories, search items, build an order, apply discounts, and finalize to a bill.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReports.tsx: React page displaying sales reports (daily summary, item-wise, monthly) in tabs, with refresh controls and an auth guard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (including café-themed colors), border radii, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a pending fix request (AR-1) to remove the 'Non-Alcoholic Beverages' prefix from Tea and Coffee category display names throughout the app.
